description: Environmentalists say a misguided attempt to protect residents has damaged a sensitive ecosystem.
title: Coronavirus: Outcry as Spanish beach sprayed with bleach
title_page: Coronavirus: Outcry as Spanish beach sprayed with bleach - BBC News
maintext: "They have devastated the dune spaces and gone against all the rules. It has been an aberration what they have done, also taking into account that the virus lives in people not on the beach. It is crazy."
